raw_glosses: (colloquial) Expresses disapproval with what one is doing, telling them to either wait first or to stop doing it and not do it again.
glosses: Expresses disapproval with what one is doing, telling them to either wait first or to stop doing it and not do it again.

synonyms.word: The päp may be repeated any arbitrary number of times

synonyms.english: The tone usually falls slowly over all of the repeats.

synonyms.word: The vowel in the initial äp may be lengthened
including space instead of a hyphen

raw_glosses: (colloquial) to dine while intoxicated; manners and eating utensils tend to be forgotten while this is occurring
glosses: to dine while intoxicated; manners and eating utensils tend to be forgotten while this is occurring

raw_glosses: (vulgar) bastard, son of a bitch (term of abuse)
glosses: bastard, son of a bitch (term of abuse)

raw_glosses: (dated, chiefly Lapland and Ostrobothnia) the soul of an unbaptized dead child; myling
glosses: the soul of an unbaptized dead child; myling

raw_glosses: (printing, informal) either a widow or an orphan (a single line of a paragraph on a separate page from the rest of the paragraph)
glosses: either a widow or an orphan (a single line of a paragraph on a separate page from the rest of the paragraph)

words.etymology_text: Likely a front-vowel variant of dialectal apara (“dregs, mash”).
